verses.verse: Having Laid Aside <WG659> Therefore <WG3767> All <WG3956> Malice <WG2549> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> Guile <WG1388> And <WG2532> Hypocrisies <WG5272> And <WG2532> Envyings <WG5355> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> Evil Speakings, <WG2636>
As <WG5613> Newborn <WG738> Babes, <WG1025> The <WG3588> Mental <WG3050> Genuine <WG97> Milk <WG1051> Long Ye After, <WG1971> That <WG2443> By <WG1722> It <WG846> Ye May Grow, <WG837>
If Indeed <WG1512> Ye Did Taste <WG1089> That Is <WG3754> Good <WG5543> The <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>

To <WG4314> Whom <WG3739> Coming, <WG4334> A Stone <WG3037> Living, <WG2198> By <WG5259> Men <WG444> Indeed <WG3303> Rejected, <WG593> <WG3844> But With <WG1161> God <WG2316> Chosen, <WG1588> Precious, <WG1784>

Also <WG2532> Yourselves, <WG846> As <WG5613> Stones <WG3037> Living, <WG2198> Are Being Built Up, <WG3618> A House <WG3624> Spiritual, <WG4152> A Priesthood <WG2406> Holy <WG40> To Offer <WG399> Spiritual <WG4152> Sacrifices <WG2378> Acceptable <WG2144> To <WG3588> God <WG2316> By <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

Wherefore <WG1352> Also <WG2532> It Is Contained <WG4023> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Scripture : <WG1124>, Behold, <WG2400> I Place <WG5087> In <WG1722> Sion <WG4622> A Stone <WG3037> Corner, <WG204> Chosen, <WG1588> Precious : <WG1784> And <WG2532> He That <WG3588> Believes <WG4100> ' On <WG1909> Him <WG846> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> Should Be Put To Shame. <WG2617>

To You <WG5213> Therefore Is <WG3767> The <WG3588> Preciousness <WG5092> Who <WG3588> Believe; <WG4100> To Those Disobeying <WG544> But, The <WG1161> Stone <WG3037> Which <WG3739> Rejected <WG593> Those <WG3588> Building, <WG3618> This <WG3778> <WG1096> Became <WG1519> Head <WG2776> Of The Corner, <WG1137>

And <WG2532> A Stone <WG3037> Of Stumbling <WG4348> And <WG2532> A Rock <WG4073> Of Offence; <WG4625> Who <WG3739> Stumble At <WG4350> The <WG3588> Word, <WG3056> Being Disobedient, <WG544> To <WG1519> Which <WG3739> Also <WG2532> They Were Appointed. <WG5087>

<WG5210> But Ye <WG1161> Are A Race <WG1085> Chosen, <WG1588> A Kingly <WG934> Priesthood, <WG2406> A Nation <WG1484> Holy, <WG40> A People <WG2992> For <WG1519> A Possession, <WG4047> That <WG3704> The <WG3588> Virtues <WG703> Ye Might Set Forth <WG1804> Of Him Who <WG3588> Out Of <WG1537> Darkness <WG4655> You <WG5209> Called <WG2564> To <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2298> His Wonderful <WG846> Light; <WG5457>

Who <WG3588> Once <WG4218> Were Not <WG3756> A People, <WG2992> <WG3568> But Now Are <WG1161> People <WG2992> God's; <WG2316> Who <WG3588> <WG3756> Had Not Received Mercy, <WG1653> <WG3568> But Now <WG1161> Received Mercy <WG1653>

Beloved, <WG27> I Exhort You <WG3870> As <WG5613> Strangers <WG3941> And <WG2532> Sojourners, <WG3927> To Abstain <WG567> From <WG3588> Fleshly <WG4559> Desires, <WG1939> Which <WG3748> War <WG4754> Against <WG2596> The <WG3588> Soul; <WG5590>

<WG3588> <WG391> Your Manner Of Life <WG5216> Among <WG1722> The <WG3588> Nations <WG1484> Having <WG2192> Right <WG2570> That <WG2443> <WG1722> Wherein <WG3739> They Speak Against <WG2635> You <WG5216> As <WG5613> Evil Doers, <WG2555> Through Your <WG1537> <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Works <WG2041> Having Witnessed <WG2029> They May Glorify <WG1392> <WG3588> God <WG2316> In The <WG1722> Day <WG2250> Of Visitation. <WG1984>

Be In Subjection <WG5293> Therefore <WG3767> To Every <WG3956> Human <WG442> Institution <WG2937> For The Sake Of <WG1223> The <WG3588> Lord; <WG2962> Whether <WG1535> To The King <WG935> As <WG5613> Supreme, <WG5242>

Or <WG1535> To Governors <WG2232> As <WG5613> ' By <WG1223> Him <WG846> Sent, <WG3992> For <WG1519> <WG1557> Vengeance On <WG3303> Evil Doers, <WG2555> <WG1868> And Praise To <WG1161> Well Doers; <WG17>

Because <WG3754> So <WG3779> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Will <WG2307> <WG3588> Of God, By <WG2316> Well Doing <WG15> To Put To Silence <WG5392> The <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Senseless <WG878> Men <WG444> Ignorance; <WG56>

As <WG5613> Free, <WG1658> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> As <WG5613> A Cloak <WG1942> Having <WG2192> <WG3588> Of Malice <WG2549> <WG3588> Freedom, <WG1657> ' But <WG235> As <WG5613> Bondmen <WG1401> Of God. <WG2316>
All <WG3956> Shew Honour To, <WG5091> The <WG3588> Brotherhood <WG81> Love, <WG25> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Fear, <WG5399> The <WG3588> King <WG935> Honour. <WG5091>

<WG3588> Servants, <WG3610> Being Subject <WG5293> With <WG1722> All <WG3956> Fear <WG5401> <WG3588> To Your Masters, <WG1203> Not <WG3756> Only <WG3440> To The <WG3588> Good <WG18> And <WG2532> Gentle, <WG1933> But <WG235> Also <WG2532> To The <WG3588> Crooked. <WG4646>

<WG5124> For This <WG1063> Is Acceptable <WG5485> If <WG1487> For Sake Of <WG1223> Conscience <WG4893> Towards God <WG2316> Endures <WG5297> Anyone <WG5100> Griefs, <WG3077> Suffering <WG3958> Unjustly. <WG95>

<WG4169> For What <WG1063> Glory Is It, <WG2811> If <WG1487> Sinning <WG264> And <WG2532> Being Buffeted <WG2852> Ye Endure It? <WG5278> ' But <WG235> If <WG1487> Doing Good <WG15> And <WG2532> Suffering <WG3958> Ye Endure It, <WG5278> This Is <WG5124> Acceptable <WG5485> With <WG3844> God. <WG2316>

<WG1519> <WG5124> For To This <WG1063> Ye Were Called; <WG2564> Because <WG3754> Also <WG2532> Christ, <WG5547> Suffered <WG3958> For <WG5228> Us, <WG2257> Us <WG2254> Leaving <WG5277> A Model <WG5261> That <WG2443> Ye Should Follow After <WG1872> <WG3588> <WG2487> In His Steps; <WG846>
Who <WG3739> Sin <WG266> <WG3756> Did No, <WG4160> Neither <WG3761> Was Found <WG2147> Guile <WG1388> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4750> His Mouth; <WG846>

Who, <WG3739> Being Railed At, <WG3058> <WG3756> Railed Not In Return; When <WG486> Suffering <WG3958> <WG3756> Threatened Not; <WG546> <WG3860> But Gave Himself Over <WG1161> To Him Who <WG3588> Judges <WG2919> Righteously; <WG1346>

Who <WG3739> <WG3588> <WG266> Our Sins <WG2257> Himself <WG846> Bore <WG399> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4983> His Body <WG846> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Tree, <WG3586> That, <WG2443> <WG3588> To Sins We <WG266> Being Dead, <WG581> <WG3588> To Righteousness <WG1343> We May Live; <WG2198> <WG3739> <WG3588> <WG3468> By Whose Bruise <WG846> Ye Were Healed. <WG2390>

<WG2258> For Ye Were <WG1063> As <WG5613> Sheep <WG4263> Going Astray, <WG4105> ' But <WG235> Are Returned <WG1994> Now <WG3568> To <WG1909> The <WG3588> Shepherd <WG4166> And <WG2532> Overseer <WG1985> <WG3588> <WG5590> Of Your Souls. <WG5216>
